bug.summary: No data assigned to some GPUs when using DataParallel
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>TypeError: descriptor 'union' of 'set' object needs an argument </denchmark-code>
Line 23 of torch_geometric/data/batch.py <denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
This error happens when using torch_geometric.nn.DataParallel. Suppose we have 4 GPUs and 4 graphs (num_nodes: [2, 3, 10, 4]). The function scatter from torch_geometric/nn/data_parallel.py gives split=[0, 2, 2, 3, 4], which means we assign two graphs to GPU:0 and no graph to GPU:1. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
